item.English: to get on; on; top/ To go up
to be going to/ have to
to go over/ to cross over
on the way/ while one is at it
to have free time/to be free
go for it/ keep it up
it's a pity/ it's a shame
to go boating/ to raw a boat
to hand something over to someone
a rest month after having a baby
to be unable to get to sleep
to get off/ to get out (train or car)
to loose electricity/ to have a blackout
to have no power/ to be out of batteries
to go on a business trip
measure word for a single class
measure word for an entire course
to get out of the car
it's the way it should be
to have been a big help
What do you do?／What is your job?
to look over/ to check for approval
to be out of one’s league
to strive for; to try hard to achieve
to celebrate the Chinese New Year
to expect; to look forward to
to do... at the same time of doing...
to find/ to notice/ to spot
measure word for long/ thin objects
can eat/ to be able to eat

item.Word: 我會用每天記5個單詞這個方法來學會150個單詞。
item.Simplified: 我会用每天记5个单词这个方法来学会150个单词。
item.Pinyin: Wǒ huì yòng měi tiān jì wǔgè dāncí zhège fāngfǎ lái xuéhuì yìbǎi wǔshí gè dāncí.
item.English: I'll master 150 words by memorizing 5 words a day.

item.Word: 我將學習怎樣談論過去的、現在的和將來的事。
item.Simplified: 我将学习怎样谈论过去的、现在的和将来的事。
item.Pinyin: Wǒ jiāng xuéxí zěnyàng tánlùn guòqù de, xiànzài de hé jiānglái de shì.
item.English: I'll learn how to talk about past/ present and future events.

item.Word: 我要用ChineseClass101.com的單詞卡記住350個單詞。
item.Simplified: 我要用ChineseClass101.com的单词卡记住350个单词。
item.Pinyin: Wǒ yào yòng ChineseClassyīlíngyī diǎn com de dāncí kǎ jìzhu sānbǎi wǔshí ge dāncí.
item.English: I'll finish memorizing 350 words with Flashcards on ChineseClass101.com.

item.Word: 我要用中文寫10張明信片給中國朋友。
item.Simplified: 我要用中文写10张明信片给中国朋友。
item.Pinyin: Wǒ yào yòng Zhōngwén xiě shí Zhāng míngxìnpiàn gěi Zhōngguó péngyou.
item.English: I'll write 10 postcards in Chinese to my Chinese friends.
The first day of the new lunar year
“food is the paramount necessity of the people.”

item.Word: 我要用每天10頁的速度讀完一本中文書。
item.Simplified: 我要用每天10页的速度读完一本中文书。
item.Pinyin: Wǒ yào yòng měi tiān shí yè de sùdù dúwánYī běn Zhōngwén shū.
item.English: I'll finish reading one Chinese book by reading 10 pages a day.

item.Word: 我將每天看同一部中文電影直到完全聽懂為止。
item.Simplified: 我将每天看同一部中文电影直到完全听懂为止。
item.Pinyin: Wǒ jiāng měi tiān kàn tóngyī bù Zhōngwén diànyǐng zhídào wánquán tīngdǒng wéizhǐ.
item.English: I'll fully understand one Chinese movie by watching it every day.

item.Word: 我要給我的中國朋友做一個3分鐘的自我介紹。
item.Simplified: 我要给我的中国朋友做一个3分钟的自我介绍。
item.Pinyin: Wǒ yào gěi wǒde Zhōngguó péngyǒu zuò yīgè sānfēnzhōng de zìwǒ jièshào.
item.English: I'll give a 3 minute introductory speech in Chinese to my Chinese friends.

item.Pinyin: Wǒ yào jìzhù wǔshǒu Zhōngguó gēqǔ.

item.English: to exisit/ to be doing something

item.Pinyin: Nǐ de shēngrì shì shénme shíhòu?
nǐ zài nǎlǐ xué de Zhōngwén ?

item.English: How long have you been studying Chinese?

item.Simplified: 感谢你给我们投简历。但是这个职位已经有合适的人选了。
item.English: Thank you for your resume. However/ the position has been filled.
We should see other people. / We are not right for each other.

item.Simplified: 我不再需要学习任何东西。
item.English: I don't need to learn anything anymore.
It's too hard/ don't even try.

item.Word: 謝謝，其實這不是我的母語。
item.Simplified: 谢谢，其实这不是我的母语。
item.Pinyin: Xièxiè, qíshí zhè búshì wǒde mǔyǔ.
item.English: Thank you but I'm not a native speaker actually.

item.Word: 我只花了一年時間就說得流暢了。
item.Simplified: 我只花了一年时间就说得流畅了。
item.Pinyin: Wǒ zhǐ huāle yī nián shíjiān jiù shuō dé liúchàng le.
item.English: It took me only one year to become fluent.

item.Pinyin: Nǐ shuō de wǒ quándōu néng míngbái.
item.English: I completely understood everything you said.

item.Pinyin: Wǒ yǐjīng xuéle zhōngwén shí nián.
item.English: I've been learning Chinese for 10 years.
I'm learning Chinese all by myself.
I’m not good enough for you.

item.Pinyin: Wǒ zhǐ shì bù zài ài nǐ le .
item.English: I just don't love you anymore.

item.Word: 我把新學的詞和故事、遊戲或電影聯繫在一起。
item.Simplified: 我把新学的词和故事、游戏或电影联系在一起。
item.Pinyin: Wǒ bǎ xīn xué de cí hé gùshì, yóuxì huò diànyǐng liánxì zài yīqǐ.
item.English: I associate new words with stories/ games or movies.

item.Pinyin: Wǒ tīng gē bìng jì gēcí .
item.English: I listen to songs and memorize the lyrics.

item.Word: 我把新學的詞和其他學過的相關詞語聯繫在一起。
item.Simplified: 我把新学的词和其他学过的相关词语联系在一起。
item.Pinyin: Wǒ bǎ xīn xué de cí hé qítā xuéguò de xiāngguān cíyǔ liánxì zài yīqǐ.
item.English: I categorize new words with other related words that I already know.

item.Word: 盡量多閱讀，尤其是多讀報紙，有助於我記單詞。
item.Simplified: 尽量多阅读，尤其是多读报纸，有助于我记单词。
item.Pinyin: Jìnliàng duō yuèdú , yóuqí shì duō dú bàozhǐ , yǒuzhùyú wǒ jì dāncí .
item.English: Reading as much as possible/ especially the newspaper/ helps me to remember words.

item.Word: 我一遍又一遍重複練習閱讀、寫作和口語。
item.Simplified: 我一遍又一遍重复练习阅读、写作和口语。
item.Pinyin: Wǒ yíbiànyòuyíbiàn chóngfù liànxí yuèdú , xiězuò hé kǒuyǔ .
item.English: I use repetition: reading/ writing and speaking words over and over again.

item.Word: 我盡可能常跟母語者說話。
item.Simplified: 我尽可能常跟母语者说话。
item.Pinyin: Wǒ jǐn kěnéng cháng gēn mǔyǔ zhě shuōhuà.
item.English: I speak as often as possible with native speakers.

item.Pinyin: nínhǎo , hěn gāoxìng jiàn dào nǐ.
item.English: Hello/ it's nice to meet you.

item.Word: 我學習中文已經二十四年了。
item.Simplified: 我学习中文已经二十四年了。
item.Pinyin: Wǒ xuéxí zhōngwén yǐjīng èr shí sì nián le.
item.English: I have been learning Chinese for 24 years.

item.Word: 我的夢想是成為一名中文老師。
item.Simplified: 我的梦想是成为一名中文老师。
item.Pinyin: Wǒ de mèngxiǎng shì chéngwéi yī míng zhōngwén lǎoshī.
item.English: My dream is to be a Chinese teacher.

item.Word: 我會通過一天聽兩節課來學完ChineseClass101.com的生存短語系列。
item.Simplified: 我会通过一天听两节课来学完ChineseClass101.com的生存短语系列。
item.Pinyin: Wǒ huì tōngguò yītiān tīng liǎng jié kè lái xué wán ChineseClass101.Com de shēngcún duǎnyǔ xìliè.
item.English: I'll finish Survival Phrases series on ChineseClass101.com by listening to two lesson a day.

item.Pinyin: Wǒ gěi nǐ dàile xiē lǐwù.

item.English: There will be a bonus at the end of the month.

item.Pinyin: Wǒ yǒu yīgè jīngxǐ yào gěi nǐ.
item.English: I have a surprise for you.
Where there's a will/ there's a way.
to call; to make a sound

item.Pinyin: Wǒ zuòle duìbuqǐ nǐ de shì .

item.English: Friendship is more suitable for us.

item.Pinyin: Wǒ gěi bù liǎo nǐ xiǎng yào de .
item.English: I can't give you what you want.

item.Pinyin: Wǒmen táo búguò qī nián zhī yǎng .
item.English: We can't survive through the seven-year itch.

item.Word: 我只想專注於我的事業。
item.Simplified: 我只想专注于我的事业。
item.Pinyin: Wǒ zhǐ xiǎng zhuān zhù yú Wǒ de shìyè .
item.English: I need to focus on my career.

item.Word: 你是個好人，只是我們不適合對方。
item.Simplified: 你是个好人，只是我们不适合对方。
item.Pinyin: Nǐ shì ge hǎorén , zhǐ shì wǒmen bú shìhé duìfāng
item.English: You're a good guy. It's just we are not right for each other.

item.Word: 因為中文對我的工作很有用。
item.Simplified: 因为中文对我的工作很有用。
item.Pinyin: Yīnwèi Zhōngwén duì Wǒ de gōngzuò hěn yǒu yòng.
item.English: Because Chinese is useful for my job.

item.Word: 因為我是華裔，我想學習我的傳統語言。
item.Simplified: 因为我是华裔，我想学习我的传统语言。
item.Pinyin: Yīnwèi Wǒ shì huáyì, Wǒ xiǎng xuéxí Wǒ de chuántǒng yǔyán.
item.English: Because my ethnicity is Chinese/ I want to learn my traditional language.

item.Pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng bān dào Zhōngguó shēnghuó.
item.English: I want to move and live in China.

item.Word: 我很喜歡中國的文化和人民。
item.Simplified: 我很喜欢中国的文化和人民。
item.Pinyin: Wǒ hěn xǐhuān Zhōngguó de wénhuà hé rénmín.
item.English: I love Chinese culture and people.
Chinese culture is rich/ extensive and profound.

item.Word: 我希望用中文和我的親家溝通。
item.Simplified: 我希望用中文和我的亲家沟通。
item.Pinyin: Wǒ xīwàng yòng Zhōngwén hé Wǒ de qìngjia gōutōng.
item.English: I want to communicate with my partner's family using Chinese.

item.Word: 我在大學裏有中文課程。
item.Simplified: 我在大学里有中文课程。
item.Pinyin: Wǒ zài dàxué lǐ yǒu Zhōngwénkè chéng.
item.English: It's part of my university studies.

item.Pinyin: Xuéxí Zhōngwén shì Wǒ de àihào.

item.English: You must do what I say.

item.Simplified: 我不再需要学习任何新的东西。
item.English: I don't need to learn anything anymore.

item.Word: 我盡量在日常生活中使用中文。
item.Simplified: 我尽量在日常生活中使用中文。
item.Pinyin: Wǒ jìnliàng zài rìcháng shēnghuó zhōng shǐyòng Zhōngwén.
item.English: I try to use Chinese as much as possible in my daily life.

item.Word: 把文字和圖片聯繫起來。
item.Simplified: 把文字和图片联系起来。
item.Pinyin: Bǎ wénzì hé túpiàn liánxì qǐlai.
item.English: Associate the Chinese word with the picture.

item.Word: 我試著將所學到的新詞用在句子裏，這樣我學會的是完整的表達而不是一個個單獨的詞語。
item.Simplified: 我试着将所学到的新词用在句子里，这样我学会的是完整的表达而不是一个个单独的词语。
item.Pinyin: Wǒ shìzhe jiāng suǒxuédào de xīncí yòng zài jùzi lǐ, zhèyàng Wǒ xuéhuì de shì wánzhěng de biǎodá ér bú shì yí gègè dāndú de cíyǔ.
item.English: I try to use new words in a simple sentence/ so I learn whole phrases/ not just individual words.
What are you watching right now?
